headline: Has S&P Global’s Expansion Into Environmental Data Shifted Its True Value in 2025?
summary: Wondering if S&P Global is undervalued, overpriced, or somewhere in between? Let’s break down what is driving the conversation for curious investors. S&P Global’s stock has experienced slight momentum recently, up 1.1% in the last week and 1.5% over the past month. However, it is down 3.8% over the past year. Recently, S&P Global made headlines with its expansion into environmental data services and its acquisition of a fintech analytics startup. These developments give investors new factors...
